document.full_text: as the 663rd pick in the 2007 draft, dillon gee was not considered a top prospect, but the mets hope that his start friday against the astros in his native texas will lead to a permanent spot in the rotation.
document.title: from low draft pick to chance in rotation
lines_and_colors: as the 663rd pick in the 2007 draft, dillon gee was not considered a top prospect, but the mets hope that his start friday against the astros in his native texas will lead to a permanent spot in the rotation.
